guide.introduction: In this project we are going to take an ordinary camera and turn it into a trip-wire or magnetic reed-switch triggered spy and security camera!
guide.introduction_rendered:
In this project we are going to take an ordinary camera and turn it into a trip-wire or magnetic reed-switch triggered spy and security camera!

Relevant parts
  • Transistor
  • Magnetic reed switch
  • Resistor
  • Wire
  • Solderless breadboard
  • Solderless Breadboard Jumper Wire Kit
  • Battery
Tools
  • Digital camera
  • Lighter
  • Screwdriver
  • Soldering iron

lines.text: Lay out your components on your workbench.
lines.text_raw: Lay out your components on your workbench.

lines.text: I couldn't use a camera because I have only got one.

lines.text: Locate the trigger button terminals and solder two wires to them.

lines.text: Feed the wires through the trigger button hole.

lines.text: Make all necessary jumpers and final connections on the breadboard.

lines.text: Note: The LED and red jumpers represent the camera wires.

lines.text: The blue wire represents the switch or trip wire.

lines.text: Solder all the connections together either barebone or on perfboard.

lines.text: Now just wait for someone to come.

lines.text: Make two: one for power, one for trigger.
